text: hamane tumhaaree or usee prakaar vahyad kee hai jis prakaar nooh aur usake baad ke nabiyon kee or vahyu kee. aur hamane ibaraaheem, isamaeel, isahaaq aur yaaqoob aur usakee santaan aur eesa aur ayyoob aur yoonus aur haaroon aur sulaimaan kee or bhee vahyak kee. aur hamane daud ko zaboor pradaan kiya
